channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 College Football Conference Championship Game Clinching Scenarios
item.description: Here are all the Power 4 conference championship game clinching scenarios heading into the final week of the regular season.

item.title: Here's How Michigan Can Still Make the Big Ten Championship Game
item.description: No. 15 Michigan isn't fully out of this thing just yet, as they control at least part of their Big Ten destiny.

item.title: Noah Fifita finds Cameron Barmore for 9-yard TD, giving Arizona lead over Arizona State
item.description: Noah Fifita found Cameron Barmore for a 9-yard TD, giving the Arizona Wildcats the lead over the Arizona State Sun Devils.

item.title: 2025 NBA Cup Odds: Thunder Favored; Lakers in Contention
item.description: The 2025 NBA Cup continues on Friday. See the odds for who is slated to win the latest in-season tournament.

item.title: Arizona's Kedrick Reescano punches it in from one yard for the TD, extending lead over Arizona State
item.description: Arizona Wildcat's Kedrick Reescano punched it in from one yard out for the TD vs. the Arizona State Sun Devils.

item.title: Bears' win in Philly sends message: 'We're for real'
item.description: The Bears' 24-15 win over the Eagles went a long way toward legitimizing their surprising run this season, with several players saying they're "changi...

item.title: Inside weird and wonderful college football rivalry trophies
item.description: What do an axe, skillet and a gold boot have in common? Meet the iconic rivalry trophies of college football.

item.title: Arch rallies Longhorns, hands Aggies first loss
item.description: Trailing at the half, No. 16 Texas, backed by a standout effort from quarterback Arch Manning, rallied to defeat rival Texas A&M 27-17, spoiling the N...

item.title: Hoosiers roll to 12-0, seal Big Ten title game spot
item.description: Despite Fernando Mendoza's struggles, No. 2 Indiana rolled to a 56-3 win over rival Purdue, completing the first perfect regular season in school hist...

item.title: Kiffin to make 'hard decision' on future Saturday
item.description: Lane Kiffin said he'll decide Saturday whether he will return as Ole Miss' coach in 2026 or take another job, presumably at LSU.
